author: James Ley
text: What is the core dynamic at play here?  What interactions are in conflict or flux?  Our unique form of democracy, evolving social revolution, a decentralized economy. I found thevfollowing article of interest and thought provoking. How can we build structures to stem the tide if we don't understand or ar come to a common agreement on the components that create the tide?
title: Mastering the Context
